What causes Fanconi Anemia ?,"Fanconi anemia (FA) is an inherited disease. The term inherited means that the disease is passed from parents to children through genes. At least 13 faulty genes are associated with FA. FA occurs when both parents pass the same faulty FA gene to their child.
                
People who have only one faulty FA gene are FA ""carriers."" Carriers don't have FA, but they can pass the faulty gene to their children.
